function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dependence on 5G network for data collection and transmission","Impact":"Failure to collect or transmit data effectively, resulting in missed detection of individuals with abnormal body temperatures.","Mitigation":"Backup data collection and transmission methods (e.g., Wi-Fi, cellular network) as redundancy.","Technologies":"Wi-Fi, cellular network","People":"Security staff, developers of the system","Owner":"Security staff, IT department"},{"Description":"Reliance on AI algorithm for temperature measurement","Impact":"Inaccurate temperature measurement leading to missed detection of individuals with fever or false alarms.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of the AI algorithm, manual temperature checks as a backup.","Technologies":"Calibration tools, manual temperature measurement devices","People":"Developers of the AI algorithm, security staff","Owner":"Health department, IT department"},{"Description":"Privacy and data security concerns with smart monitors at home doors","Impact":"Unauthorized access to personal data, breaches of privacy for the home-quarantined individuals.","Mitigation":"Strong encryption of data, regular security audits, clear privacy policies and user consent.","Technologies":"Encryption technology, security auditing tools","People":"Home-quarantined individuals, IT security experts","Owner":"IT department, legal department"}]}
